title: NAPLAN validation schema
description: Schema for validating student registrations for NAPLAN SRM

JurisdictionId.title: JurisdictionId schema.
JurisdictionId.description: Student Id assigned by jurisdiction, such as a state-level ID.
JurisdictionId.name: JurisdictionId

TAAId.title: TAAId schema.
TAAId.description: An identifier assigned by and used by TAA for NAPLAN processing.
TAAId.name: TAAId
